name: Castelli Entrata Shorts - Men's
description: Ride for longer. The more comfortable you are, the longer you'll want to ride. These performance shorts feature moisture wicking fabrics and a chamois to relieve pressure in the saddle. They provide light compression to reduce muscle fatigue when you're pushing your limits.KISS Air chamois dampens vibrations and cushions your ride.Pro Dry fabric with spandex provides light compression and great moisture management.Body-mapped design combines 8 panels for a great fit in riding position.Gripped hem prevents slippage at the leg.Reflective details.
